name: Roofside Picnic
description:
Roofside Picnic is a short cozy platformer with adventure elements set in beautiful cityscapes with no humans in sight.

You play as a rat, a curious urban dweller on a stroll. Explore the inside of the historic city center as you walk and climb its rooftops, attics and stairwells. Get to know the true natives of this mysterious city, and uncover its little secrets. Have a moment for yourself on this cozy rainy day.

Features:

Classic platformer. All sorts of rooftops, chimneys, boxes and stairs are yours to jump and run.

Short game. It won't take much, but it will give just enough.

Joy of discovery. Meet the vivid and engaging characters and see what this place have for you to find.

Enjoy the view. The setting is inspired by the majestic cityscapes of Saint-Petersburg, Russia.

Quiet place. You don't have to fight to be here. If you fell, just climb back in.
